#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
struct node
{
	ll sum;
	int card;
};
int n,a[105];struct node dp[105][1025];
struct node solve( int index , int x)
{
	if(index==(n))
	{
		return (struct node){0,0};
	}
	if(dp[index][x].card!=-1)
		return dp[index][x];
	int temp=a[index],b=0,rem;
	while(temp)
	{
		rem=temp%10;
		
		temp/=10;
		b=(b|(1<<rem));
	}
	bool flag=1;
	for(int i=0;i<10;++i)
	{
		if((b&(1<<i))&&(x&(1<<i)))
		{
			flag=0;
			break;
		}
	}
	struct node s1,s2;
	s1.sum=s2.sum=INT_MIN;
	s1.card=s2.card=-1;
	if(flag==true)
	{
		s1=solve(index+1,x|b);
		s1.sum+=(ll)a[index];
		s1.card+=1;
		s2=solve(index+1,x) ;
	}
	else
	{
		s2=solve(index+1,x);
		
	}
	if(s1.sum>s2.sum)
	{
		return dp[index][x]=s1;
	}
	else if(s1.sum<s2.sum)
	{
		return dp[index][x]=s2;
	}
	else 
	{
		if(s1.card > s2.card)
			return dp[index][x]=s1;
		return dp[index][x]=s2;
	}
	
}
int main()
{
	
	int i,j;
	while(scanf("%d",&n)!=EOF)
	{
		for(i=0;i<n;++i)
		{
			
			scanf("%d",&a[i]);
		}
		for(i=0;i<=n;++i)
		{
			for(j=0;j<=1024;++j)
				dp[i][j].card=-1;
		}
		struct node s=solve(0,0);
		printf("%d\n",s.card);
	}

	return 0;
}
